benefits.title: Nonsense-mediated decay approaches the clinic
benefits.summary: NMD helps limit the synthesis of abnormal proteins and affects the expression of wild-type genes and alternative-splice products.

benefits.title: Long-Term Administration of Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Mitigates Age-Associated Physiological Decline in Mice.
benefits.summary: NMN effectively mitigates age-associated physiological decline in mice, suppressing age-associated body weight gain, enhancing energy metabolism, and improving insulin sensitivity.

benefits.title: Impairment of an Endothelial NAD+-H2S Signaling Network Is a Reversible Cause of Vascular Aging
benefits.summary: NMN improves blood flow and increases endurance in elderly mice by promoting SIRT1-dependent increases in capillary density.

benefits.title: NAD+ Repletion Rescues Female Fertility during Reproductive Aging
benefits.summary: NMN treatment rejuvenates oocyte quality in aged animals, leading to restoration in fertility and reversing the adverse effect of maternal age on developmental milestones.

benefits.title: Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Supplementation Reverses the Declining Quality of Maternally Aged Oocytes.
benefits.summary: NMN supplementation improves the quality of oocytes from naturally aged mice, increasing ovulation and enhancing meiotic competency and fertilization ability.

benefits.title: Cardioprotection by nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN): Involvement of glycolysis and acidic pH.
benefits.summary: NMN protects hearts against ischemia-reperfusion injury, with benefits mediated in part via glycolytic stimulation and enhanced ATP synthesis during ischemia and/or enhanced acidosis during reperfusion.
benefits.journal: Journal of molecular and cellular cardiology

benefits.title: Nicotinamide mononucleotide ameliorates the depression-like behaviors and is associated with attenuating the disruption of mitochondrial bioenergetics in depressed mice.
benefits.summary: NMN administration alleviated depression-like behavior and improved mitochondrial energy metabolism in a mouse model of CORT-induced depression.

benefits.title: Nicotinamide mononucleotide attenuates isoproterenol-induced cardiac fibrosis by regulating oxidative stress and Smad3 acetylation.
benefits.summary: NMN attenuates cardiac fibrosis in vivo and fibroblast activation in vitro by suppressing oxidative stress and Smad3 acetylation in a NAD+/SIRT1-dependent manner.

benefits.title: Adaptive changes induced by noble-metal nanostructures in vitro and in vivo
benefits.summary: NMNs can induce adaptive changes in tissues and cells, potentially benefiting therapeutics, diagnostics, and bioimaging fields.

benefits.title: Metabolic engineering of Escherichia coli for biosynthesis of β‐nicotinamide mononucleotide from nicotinamide
benefits.summary: NMN administration improves symptoms like diabetes and age-related physiological decline, making it a promising nutraceutical.

side effects.title: Bis- and mixed-tetrahydroisoquinolinium chlorofumarates: new ultra-short-acting nondepolarizing neuromuscular blockers.
side effects.summary: Side effects of NMN include hyperkalemia, malignant hyperthermia, cardiac arrhythmias, fasciculations, severe muscle pain, increased intraocular pressure, and increased intragastric tension.

side effects.title: Neuroleptic malignant syndrome.
side effects.summary: NMS is a serious neurologic side effect of antipsychotic therapy characterized by fever, altered mental state, muscular rigidity, and dysautonomia.

side effects.title: Measurement of slow (micros-ms) time scale dynamics in protein side chains by (15)N relaxation dispersion NMR spectroscopy: application to Asn and Gln residues in a cavity mutant of T4 lysozyme.
side effects.summary: The new NMR experiment measures micros-ms time scale dynamics of protein side chains, potentially revealing chemical exchange processes that facilitate the binding of hydrophobic ligands to the protein's cavity.
side effects.journal: Journal of the American Chemical Society

side effects.title: Nicotinamide mononucleotide and related metabolites induce disease resistance against fungal phytopathogens in Arabidopsis and barley
side effects.summary: NMN pretreatment enhances disease resistance to Fusarium graminearum in Arabidopsis and barley, involving activation of salicylic acid-mediated signaling pathways and repression of jasmonic acid/ethylene-dependent signaling pathways.

side effects.title: Nicotinamide mononucleotide: a potential effective natural compound against insulin resistance
side effects.summary: NMN administration showed positive effects on insulin sensitivity, insulin signaling, and tissue remodelling in skeletal muscle in postmenopausal overweight or obese women with prediabetes.

side effects.title: Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Prevents Cisplatin-Induced Cognitive Impairments
side effects.summary: Increasing NAD+ levels through NMN supplementation prevents cisplatin-induced abnormalities in neural progenitor proliferation, neuronal morphogenesis, and cognitive function without affecting tumor growth and antitumor efficacy of cisplatin.

side effects.title: Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Prevents Cisplatin-Induced Mitochondrial Defects in Cortical Neurons Derived from Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells
side effects.summary: NMN prevents cisplatin-induced defects in mitochondria of human cortical neurons, potentially ameliorating cisplatin-induced cognitive impairments.

side effects.title: Efficacy and safety of beta-interferon in Thai patients with demyelinating diseases
side effects.summary: IFN-Î± treatment in Thai patients with multiple sclerosis reduced annualized relapse rates and disability progression, but may worsen symptoms in NMO/NMOSDs patients.

side effects.title: Nanomedicinal products: a survey on specific toxicity and side effects
side effects.summary: Nanomedicine-specific side effects, such as pseudo-allergic responses, cannot be excluded, but immunotoxicological effects of certain NMPs cannot be excluded.

side effects.title: Late-onset neutropenia during long-term rituximab therapy in neuromyelitis optica.
side effects.summary: Late-onset neutropenia (LON) is a possible side effect during rituximab therapy and may occur in neuromyelitis optica patients.

dosage.title: Nicotinamide mononucleotide supplementation enhances aerobic capacity in amateur runners: a randomized, double-blind study
dosage.summary: NMN supplementation at 300, 600, and 1200 mg/day increases aerobic capacity in amateur runners during exercise training.
dosage.journal: Journal of the International Society of Sports Nutrition

dosage.title: Effect of oral administration of nicotinamide mononucleotide on clinical parameters and nicotinamide metabolite levels in healthy Japanese men.
dosage.summary: Oral administration of NMN was found to be safe and effective in healthy men, with doses of 100, 250, and 500 mg being considered safe.

dosage.title: Nicotinamide mononucleotide inhibits post-ischemic NAD+ degradation and dramatically ameliorates brain damage following global cerebral ischemia
dosage.summary: NMN (62.5mg/kg) at a proper dosage has a strong protective effect against ischemic brain injury.

dosage.title: Is appropriately conducted neostigmine reversal inferior to sugammadex? A reply
dosage.summary: Neostigmine reversal dosage is 50-70 mcg.kg-1 for moderate block levels.

dosage.title: Oral carcinogenesis by intraperitoneal N-methyl-N-nitrosourea in the Syrian hamster.
dosage.summary: Intraperitoneal NMU dosages in this study were 15mg/kg body weight, 12.5mg/kg, or 10mg/kg.

dosage.title: Validated 1H and 19F nuclear magnetic resonance for the quantitative determination of the hepatitis C antiviral drugs sofosbuvir, ledipasvir, and daclatasvir in tablet dosage forms
dosage.summary: The linearity range of qNMR for hepatitis C antiviral drugs was in the range of 2-24 mg/mL, with a linearity range of 2-24 mg/mL for all drugs.

dosage.title: Chronic nicotinamide mononucleotide supplementation elevates blood nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide levels and alters muscle function in healthy older men
dosage.summary: 250 mg NMN per day was administered to aged men for 6 or 12 weeks in a placebo-controlled, randomized, double-blind, parallel-group trial.

dosage.title: N-methyl-d, l-aspartate stimulates growth hormone but not luteinizing hormone secretion in the sheep.
dosage.summary: NMA at a dose of 12 mg/kg body weight stimulates growth hormone secretion in castrated male sheep.

dosage.title: Safety evaluation after acute and sub-chronic oral administration of high purity Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN-C®) in Sprague-Dawley rats.
dosage.summary: NMN-C® was found to be safe at doses of 375, 750, and 1500 mg/kg/d for a 90-day sub-chronic period in rats.
dosage.journal: Food and chemical toxicology : an international journal published for the British Industrial Biological Research Association

dosage.title: Subacute Toxicity Study of Nicotinamide Mononucleotide via Oral Administration
dosage.summary: Oral administration of NMN once per day for 7 days is well tolerated with minimal deleterious effects in mice and beagle dogs.
